label: 文華秀麗集
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: ぶんかしゅうれいしゅう
見出し読み_mod: ぶんかしゅうれいしゅう
説明文: Presented (in 817) by Fujiwara Fuyutsugu ...in three books (kan).  This is an anothology of Chinese poems (shi) composed by twenty-six Japanese authors, and compiled at the command of Saga-Tennō by Sugawara Kiyogimi, Shigeno Sadanushi, and others (Part A, p. 238). [藤原冬嗣、巻、詩、嵯峨天皇、菅原清公、滋野貞主]
